attributes.action: Bring In Registration and Insurance For Cyclists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With more and more cyclists using todays busy roads, it must be time to ensure their wellbeing in the case of an accident that they have adequate insurance cover in case of injury/damage to themselves and possibly third parties.

In most european countries a method of cycle registration is employed by using an insurance disc attached to the cycle as a means of identification and ownership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
